snippet.title: Hide Time - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
●════════════════════════════●

It's finally here! Gameplay trailer for Hide Time has just dropped! :D
The whole team has been working really hard to bring this game to you all and we are getting close!
We hope you like the gameplay shown in the trailer!

Feel free to leave a comment with feedback or your ideas for improvements!
We want to release this game in the best state possible!

If you want to support our work, please share this trailer with others and follow the game on Steam and Gamejolt:

Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/3131800/Hide_Time/
Gamejolt - https://gamejolt.com/games/HideTime/913886

With all that said get ready! Chapter 1 will drop this Fall! 

●════════════════════════════●

Our socials: https://linktr.ee/Midnight_Games2023
Join the Hide Time Discord server: https://discord.gg/XsTMfSH6wr

●════════════════════════════●
#HideTime #indiegame #Midnightgames #indiedev #indiedevelopers  #mascothorror #spookygame #horrorgame #gaming #indiehorrorgames 
#spookygames #steamgame #videogames #videogame #mascothorrorgame #storydrivengames #storydrivengame #game #games #gaming #gamers #creep #freegame #horrorstory
